summary: Better, sexier, more epic looking for your\'s favorite companion\'s.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/962/bannerbfl.jpg[/img]

[img]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/4457/descriptione.jpg[/img]
[b][color=lightblue]Hello again.[/color][/b]
I have created this mod for ladies. I have decided to revive all famous companion (and NPC). 
I will be making more of this remake. For now choice is small, but give me some time and inspiration. Just check this side, becose i will be puting there information and new companion (No more standalone mod). Now i have a little problem with CK, but when i will figure this out, I will also changing race of companion. To many nord, and just a little of Argonians? I will fix that. 

You can also ask me to remake some of the companion. I am open for proposition. Best for me is when you ask me to do some remake and send me a photo with inspiration.

Im working on totally new companion calling Sintell. She will be rudy little thief (non from Riften organization). And when i will find a man with strong voice i will also make a new man companion. This is a very future plan, becose now im nooby, and only learning. But i have many time, and so many idea... I\'m playing RPG since i was 9 years old little girl. 

Sorry for my dark image, but i rly like this style. 

Im also fan of Vampire: Masquarade and whole of World Of Darkness book\'s. So don\'t be angry for me changing man into Vampire. (Like Marcurio) I promiss i will be doing 2 version of them ; ) 

Im not a man, so i dont know what exacly you will like. But i have my girl type, maybe this will satisfact you. I dont know. Epic Female Companion Compilation is coming, so be prepared! 


[img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/9748/changelogo.jpg[/img]
[b]Version 1.2[/b]
Added Vampiric Companion option for Calder and Marcurio
Added Long Haired Vilkas option.
[b]Version 1.1[/b]
Added new Kharjo option.
[b]Version 1.0[/b]
Version v.1.0 - Now with NMM installation options. Thanks to Bellyaches!

[img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/1354/upcoming.jpg[/img]
[b][color=lightblue]Lydia[/color][/b]
New Lydia. I consider her to be a warrior, so now she is Werewolf and belong\'s to Companion. 
Now you can find her[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10812] -->hire<-- [/url]
[img]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/2659/lydiat.png[/img]

[i]Sorry for my english.[/i]


[img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/6610/howtoinstall.jpg[/img]
1. Download by NMM
2. Fallow steps
3. Remember to choose only one version for double companion! For example: if you choos Vilkas, dont pick up Vilkas with Long Hair! Or when you pick up Calder, do not match Vampiric Calder!

Or:
1. Download newest version of mod.
2. Ignor fomod file.
3. Put you choice esp. file in to \\Skyrim\\Data folder
4. Start Skyrim Launcher and make sure to set esp files as active
5. Enjoy you new companion.

[b]IMPORTANT[/b]
This mod is incompatibile with any other mod that change .esp file for this companion!
Before you install this version make sure that you have unistalled older version!

[img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/870/futureplant.jpg[/img]
Vilkas with warpaint version (2 wariants)
Farkas with warpaint version (2 wariant)
Female Better Look for all man. 
Ulfric and Brynjolf better look. 
Totaly new female companion. 


[b]Recommended mod\'s[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]

[img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/425/creditsqj.jpg[/img]

- Bellyaches for providing me to right track in editing NMM installation. Without her help i would never figured this out!

- Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the whole TES series. And for giving us tool like CK to make theyr game better!
[/center]
author: Gnatozuj
